PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_EnvironmentalCondition
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties defining environment conditions required by the element.

PropertyDef.Name: ReferenceAirRelativeHumidity
PropertyDef.Definition: Measurement of the ratio of water vapor in the air.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumAtmosphericPressure
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum level of atmospheric pressure that the equipment can operate effectively in.

PropertyDef.Name: StorageTemperatureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowed storage temperature range that the element complies with.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumWindSpeed
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum resistance to wind load exposure.

PropertyDef.Name: OperationalTemperatureRange
PropertyDef.Definition:
The temperature range in which the device operates normally.
Allowable operation ambient air temperature range.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumRainIntensity
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum level of rain intensity that the equipment can operate effectively in. It is usually measured in millimeter per hour (mm/h).

PropertyDef.Name: SaltMistLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum level of salt mist that the equipment can operate effectively in. It is provided according to an international or national standard.

PropertyDef.Name: SeismicResistance
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum magnitude of earthquake that the equipment complies with. The value indicates earthquake intensity measured in Richter scale.

PropertyDef.Name: SmokeLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum level of smoke that the equipment complies with. It is provided according to an international or national standard.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumSolarRadiation
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum level of solar irradiance that the equipment can operate effectively in. This is usually tested and measured by a national or international standard. The value indicates power density measured in watt per square meter (w/m2).
